final_mermaid_code:
graph TD
    A[Complaint received] --> B[Send automatic reply to customer]
    B --> C[Discuss solution]
    C --> D[Send apology]
    D --> E[Propose solution]
    E --> F{XORGateway}
    F -->|Positive response received| G[Execute solution]
    G --> H[Complaint addressed]
    F -->|Negative response received| I[Evaluate acceptable alternative]
    I --> J{XORGateway}
    J -->|No alternative solutions| K[Go to court]
    J -->|Alternative solution exists| C
    K --> L[Complaint not addressed]

    style A fill:#FFFFFF,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:2px
    style H fill:#FFFFFF,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:2px
    style L fill:#FFFFFF,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:2px
